description: Assuming EL1 is compromised, an improper address validation in RKP prior to SMR JUN-2021 Release 1 allows local attackers to create executable kernel page outside code area.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Q(10.0), R(11.0) devices with Exynos9610, 9810, 9820, 9830 <SMA JUN-2021 Release 1
